title: THE IMITATION GAME
summary: The story of British WWII cryptographer Alan Turing, who cracked the German Enigma code and later poisoned himself after being criminally prosecuted for being a homosexual..

title: WHEN THE STREET LIGHTS GO ON
summary: In the early 1980s, a town suffers through the aftermath of a brutal murder of a high school girl and a teacher.

title: CHEWIE
summary: A satirical behind the scenes look at the making of Star Wars through the eyes of Peter Mayhew who played Chewbacca.

title: THE OUTSIDER
summary: In post World War II Japan, an American former prisoner-of-war rises in the yakuza.

imdb: Father Daughter Time: A Tale of Armed Robbery and Eskimo Kisses (????) tt1937157
title: FATHER DAUGHTER TIME: A TALE OF ARMED ROBBERY AND ESKIMO KISSES
summary: A man goes on a three state crime spree with an accomplice, his eleven year old daughter

title: IN THE EVENT OF A MOON DISASTER
summary: An alternate telling of the historic APOLLO 11 mission to land on the moon that examines what might have happened if the astronauts had crash landed there.
agent: David Kopple, JP Evans, Matt Rosen

title: THE CURRENT WAR
summary: Based on the true story of the race between Thomas Edison and George Westinghouse to develop a practical system of electricity and sell their respective inventions to the country and the world.

title: MAGGIE
summary: As a “walking dead” virus spreads across the country, a farm family helps their eldest daughter come to terms with her infection as she slowly becomes a flesh-eating zombie.
producer: Pierre-Ange Le Pogam, Trevor Kaufman, Matthew Baer

title: THE END
summary: Four people - a veteran broadcaster in London, a sixteen year old girl and her boyfriend in Ann Arbor, and a devoted family man in Shanghai - each try to make peace with their lives before an interstellar event ends the world in six hours.

title: BEYOND THE PALE
summary: Teenage siblings suspect they’ve been ripped off by the town undertaker, but what they discover is much more sinister than either imagined.

title: EZEKIEL MOSS
summary: A mysterious stranger who possibly has the power to channel the souls of the dead changes the lives of everyone in a small Nebraska town, especially a young widow and her 11-year-old son.

title: GRACE OF MONACO
summary: Grace Kelly, age 33 and having given up her acting career to focus on being a full time princess, uses her political maneuvering behind the scenes to save Monaco while French Leader Charles de Gaulle and Monaco’s Prince Rainier III are at odds over the princi pality’s standing as a tax haven.

title: HE’S FUCKIN’ PERFECT
summary: A social media savvy girl who is pessimistic about love finds the perfect guy and decides to use her internet research skills to turn herself into his perfect match.

title: BETHLEHEM
summary: A group of people struggling to survive a zombie apocalypse make an alliance with a vampire, trading themselves as food in exchange for protection since zombies don’t eat vampire.

title: POWELL
summary: Based on the true story of Colin Powell questioning the Bush administration leading up to his United Nations presentation where he made the case for going to war with Iraq.
agent: David Karp, Cliff Roberts, Dan Cohan

imdb: The Three Misfortunes of Geppetto (????) tt2094973
title: THE THREE MISFORTUNES OF GEPPETTO
summary: A prequel to the story of Pinocchio in which Geppetto endures a life of misfortune, war, and adventure, all to be with Julia Moon, his true love.

title: THE KNOLL
summary: A rookie cop and his potential flame witness JFK gunned down from the grassy knoll on November 22, 1963. Within hours, they’re on the run from the murderers who desperately need them silenced.

title: BASTARDS
summary: Two brothers, raised to believe their biological father died, find out their mother slept with many powerful and famous men in the 1970s, and the siblings hit the road to find their real father.

title: BLOOD MOUNTAIN
summary: After his team is ambushed and killed in Pakistan, a young army ranger must escort the world’s most wanted terrorist over dangerous terrain in order to bring him to justice. While being hunted by both of their enemies, they must find a way to work together in order to survive.
agent: Ramses Ishak, Michael Sheresky, Geoff Morley

title: CRAZY FOR THE STORM
summary: The true story of Norman Ollestad’s relationship with his father, who thrust the boy into the world of extreme surfing and competitive downhill skiing at the age of three. But it was that experience that allowed an 11-year old Norman to survive a plane crash amidst a blizzard in the San Gabriel mountains.

title: DESPERATE HOURS
summary: A small town crippled by WWI and the Spanish flu finds itself facing major moral questions and a brutal invading force when a young girl shows up on a rancher’s doorstep covered in blood.

title: FLARSKY
summary: A political journalist courts his old babysitter, who is now the United States secretary of state.

title: HOW TO DISAPPEAR COMPLETELY
summary: A child prodigy tries to take control of his life away from his demanding parents.
AGENT: Jay Baker, Todd Feldman, David O’Connor

title: A MANY SPLINTERED THING
summary: When a charming heartbreaker finally meets a girl he can’t have, he discovers the true meaning of love by living out other people’s love stories and writing his own.
agent: Jon Huddle, Jason Burns, Max Michael

title: THE SLACKFI PROJECT
summary: A hapless and broken hearted barista is visited by two bad-ass soldiers from the future who tell him mankind is doomed, and he alone can save them.

title: DJANGO UNCHAINED
summary: A freed slave named Django is trained as a bounty hunter by a German dentist named Schultz, and the two men set out to find Django’s enslaved wife.
producer: Double Feature Films, The Weinstein Company

title: THE MUSEUM OF BROKEN RELATIONSHIPS
summary: Lucy, a twenty-eight year old junior curator at the Metropolitan Museum of Art in NYC, is sleeping with her boss. When he dumps her she begins a collection of “break up items” and starts a blog which goes viral.

title: ST VINCENT DE VAN NUYS
summary: When a twelve year old boy in need of a babysitter moves in next door to a misanthropic aging retiree whose life mainly consists of gambling, hookers, and drinking, the elder becomes an unlikely mentor to the boy.

title: THE ACCOUNTANT
summary: The Treasury Department pursues a brilliant, autistic accountant who doubles as an assassin and “problemsolves” with precision in more ways than one.

title: SAVING MR. BANKS
summary: The story of how Walt Disney got the rights for Mary Poppins.

title: THE BIG STONE GRID
summary: A cop is pulled into an underworld organization that brutally murders people to extort money out of others.

imdb: Bridges on the Fort Point Channel (????) tt2139707
title: BRIDGES ON THE FORT POINT CHANNEL
summary: An Irish family in the 1970s, dealing with the loss of their father and the busing of black kids into white neighborhoods, decides to blow up all the bridges in Boston.

title: CITIES OF REFUGE
summary: A former FBI psychologist is called in to investigate when a young girl goes missing after the apparent murder of her father and brother by two strangers in a small Oklahoma town.

title: GOOD KIDS
summary: Four overachieving high school students in Cape Cod reinvent themselves during the summer after graduation.
agent: Simon Faber, Jeff Gorin, Sharon Jackson

title: DIRTY GRANDPA
summary: A young groom engaged to a demanding woman is forced to spend the week before his wedding with his half-blind, half-crazy, and wholly horny grandfather. Through this wild journey, his grandfather shows him how to take life by the balls and lead with his heart.

title: GRIM NIGHT
summary: A family has to defend themselves from the Grims, strange creatures who attack Earth and kill thousands one night every year.

title: HIDDEN
summary: An elevated horror-thriller about a family hiding in a bomb shelter after escaping a mysterious outbreak.
producer: Mason Novick, Roy Lee, Lawrence Grey

title: LEAVING PETE
summary: A recently divorced author is stunned when his ex writes a popular book about their breakup, and he has to keep that fact secret from his new girlfriend, who works for the book’s publisher.

title: THE FLAMINGO THIEF
summary: Grief stricken over his wife leaving him, a man finds solace in an odd activity…swiping figurines of flamingos.

title: THE GUN EATERS
summary: Four hardened New York detectives race to apprehend a relentless spree-killer who’s executing victims from Queens to Southampton in the span of a single day.

title: LITTLE WHITE CORVETTE
summary: A down and out brother and sister go to Miami to sell a duffel bag of cocaine that they found in the trunk of a corvette left them by their dead father.

title: SEX TAPE
summary: When a married couple make a sex tape to spice up their relationship, it disappears, and they are frantic to get it back.

title: TWO NIGHT STAND
summary: After an extremely regrettable one night stand, two strangers wake up to find themselves snowed in after sleeping through a blizzard that put all of Manhattan on ice. They’re now trapped together in a tiny apartment, forced to get to know each other way more than any one night stand should.

imdb: Watch Roger Do His Thing (????) tt2140657
title: WATCH ROGER DO HIS THING
summary: A retired hitman gets roped back into his old trade in order to save his friend’s life and quickly finds himself caught in a struggle trying to finish the job, and get his family out of Chicago alive at the same time.

title: FLASHBACK
summary: A former NASA pilot with amnesia — also the first person to travel the speed of light — realizes he has the ability to travel back in time and along the way rediscovers his love for his wife.

title: FRIEND OF BILL
summary: After a humiliating episode in New York, a young woman returns to her hometown and tries to deal with her alcoholism.
agent: Sarah Self, Jeff Gorin, Sharon Jackson

title: JANE GOT A GUN
summary: After her outlaw husband returns home shot with eight bullets and barely alive, Jane reluctantly reaches out to an ex-lover who she hasn’t seen in over ten years to help her defend her farm when the time comes that her husband’s gang eventually tracks him down to finish the job.
agent: Devra Lieb, Bob Hohman, Bayard Maybank

title: THE LAST DROP
summary: A fully functioning alcoholic meets the girl of his dreams and soon discovers that there’s a lot more at stake than love if he doesn’t clean up his act.

title: THE LAST WITNESS
summary: An FBI Agent interrogates an amnesiac, sole survivor of a Boston bombing in order to prevent future terrorist attacks.
agent: Trevor Astbury, Valarie Phillips, Ida Ziniti

title: MURDERS & ACQUISITIONS
summary: The world of high-stakes finance collides with that of high-priced hitmen when an ousted CEO decides to hire an assassin to kill the corporate raider who stole his company.
agent: Ramses Ishak, Michael Sheresky, Geoff Morley

title: BAD WORDS
summary: The bastard child of the organizer of the national spelling bee gets his revenge by finding a loophole and attempting to win the bee as an adult, only to find friendship in a young Indian contestant.

title: DEAD OF WINTER
summary: A teenage girl heads to a remote cabin in the mountains with her father and new stepmother - an experience the father hopes will bond the two ladies. But when a mysterious wounded Park Ranger shows up, family bonding will be the least of their concerns.

title: GASLIGHT
summary: Secretly imprisoned in a London insane asylum, the infamous Jack the Ripper helps Scotland Yard investigators solve a series of grisly murders whose victims all share one thing in common: dual puncture wounds to the neck.

title: HOME BY CHRISTMAS - BOB HOPE IN KOREA
summary: Young Larry Gelbart goes on tour with his idol Bob Hope in the middle of the Korean War and learns the true price of patriotism.
producer: Jon Shestack Productions, Pink Slip Productions

title: JURASSIC PARK
summary: A high school couple and two of their friends ditch school to catch a special preview screening of JURASSIC PARK.

title: ON A CLEAR DAY
summary: When a powerful and mysterious force invades an American city, a young father must traverse the battletorn city in an effort to save his wounded wife and rescue their stranded children.  In the process, our hero becomes the target of an enemy who will stop at nothing to kill him.

title: THE PRETTY ONE
summary: When a woman’s identical, “prettier” twin sister dies, the woman assumes her sister’s identity, moving into her apartment and the big city.

Two stories from 1974 are linked together - the unsolved murder of an LAPD officer and the nationally televised shootout in South Central Los Angeles between the Symbionese Liberation Army and the LAPD where 50,000 rounds of gunfire was exchanged. The events will be seen through the eyes of a pair of police partners, one black and one white.

title: CRISTO
summary: A man is unlawfully sentenced to an infamous prison and escapes, then transforms himself into the mysterious Cristo and systematically destroys the men who manipulated and enslaved him.

title: THE HITMAN’S BODYGUARD
summary: The world’s best bodyguard must protect his arch nemesis, the world’s top assassin…so he can testify against a brutal dictator and save his wife.
agent: Charles Ferraro, Barbara Dreyfus, Emerson Davis

title: LINE OF SIGHT
summary: After a military coup takes out the executive branch of government, the country’s survival depends on a Navy Seal sniper extraction team getting the Speaker of the House from Washington DC to New York.

title: PINOCCHIO
summary: A wooden puppet, Pinocchio, dreams of becoming a real boy.

title: SUBJECT ZERO
summary: A Frankenstein-like tale of a scientist who develops a powerful new drug that brings his son back to life after he dies in a terrible car accident. Unfortunately, the desperate experiment of a loving father leads to the creation of a flesh-eating zombie epidemic with horrific consequences.

title: UNTITLED HLAVIN HEIST
summary: An American thief living in Paris is coerced into pulling off a complex heist in order to save his kidnapped wife.

title: THE WEDDING
summary: A group of couples deal with their respective issues as they attend a wedding.

title: BEFORE I FALL
summary: When a popular teen girl is killed in a car crash, she relives the critical day seven times and makes changes in an attempt to affect the outcome; in the process, she herself changes as she tries to make up for previous heartless, self-absorbed behavior and gains a better understanding of herself and others. As she evolves and makes the connections necessary to save a bullied, depressed girl’s life, she comes to accept her own fate.

title: BREYTON AVE
summary: A group of teens living without adults and under their own social order in a small fenced-in neighborhood are forced to face what they fear is the inevitable physical danger beyond the fence.

title: THE DUFF
summary: Adapted from Kody Keplinger’s novel THE DUFF, the travails of a seventeen year old girl who believes she is the “designated ugly fat friend.”

title: EL FUEGO CALIENTE
summary: A remake of SOAPDISH, a desperate telenovela star dreaming of Hollywood stardom has her life implode, making her real life crazier than the insane show she made famous.

title: GUYS NIGHT
summary: Sick of brunches, bosses, and light beer, four co-workers set out on the mother of all guys nights in an attempt to rediscover their manhood.

title: HYPERDRIVE
summary: When a tough cop recruits a geeky sci-fi author to help him track down a mysterious murder witness, they find themselves in the middle of a space opera playing out here on Earth.

title: SELF/LESS
summary: An extremely wealthy, elderly man dying from cancer undergoes a radical medical procedure that transfers his consciousness to the body of a healthy young man but everything may not be as good as it seems when he starts to uncover the mystery of the body’s origins and the secret organization that will kill to keep its secrets.

title: UNTITLED ARIZONA PROJECT
summary: A satirically dark comedy about a homicidal foreclosure victim kidnapping a real estate agent and planning to kill her in the housing development where she finagled money from customers like him.
